<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 9PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	Business Management Systems
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	MAM
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&rsquo;s business management systems meet the needs of warehouse distributors, part stores and automotive service providers as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
	Warehouse Distributors
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
	Autopart.
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	This is a UK-developed product that is sold and promoted both in North America and in the UK Market. This product is designed for and targeted at warehouse distributors that seek to manage multiple locations and inventories on a single system for a regional area and are also suited to managing single location franchisees or buying group members. The product provides point of sale, inventory management, electronic purchasing capabilities, a fully integrated accounting module, a warehouse management module, and a business intelligence reporting module. It also allows the distributor to connect with their customers through our OpenWebs&trade; ecommerce solutions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Autopart can be delivered as an on premise solution and sold via the traditional perpetual licensing model. Autop
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	art Online is a hosted or &lsquo;cloud&rsquo; based version of our Autopart solution and is delivered as a service over the Internet, in a SaaS-based offering.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<DIV ID="PGBK" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT;">
<DIV ID="PGNUM" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	2
</DIV>
<HR NOSHADE="NOSHADE" STYLE="BORDER: CURRENTCOLOR; BORDER-IMAGE: NONE; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; BACKGROUND-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0);">
<A NAME="eolPage7"></A>
<DIV ID="PGHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT;">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
	Parts Stores
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
	Autopart.
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	This is a UK-developed product that is sold in both North America and&nbsp;UK Market.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	This product is designed for and targeted at parts store chains that seek to manage multiple locations and inventories on a single system for a regional area. It is also suited to managing single location franchisees or buying group members. The product provides point of sale, inventory management, electronic purchasing capabilities a fully integrated accounting module and a business intelligence reporting module. It also allows parts stores to connect with their automotive service customers through VAST, Autowork Online or, OpenWebs&trade; ecommerce solutions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Autopart can be delivered as an on premise so
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	lution and sold via the traditional perpetual licensing model. Autopart Online is a hosted or &lsquo;cloud&rsquo; based version of our Autopart solution and is delivered as a service over the Internet, in a SaaS-based model.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
	Automotive Service Providers
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
	VAST.
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	This product is designed for and targeted to large-to-medium sized automotive service and tire chains that seek to manage multiple locations and inventories for a regional area it is also suited to managing single location stores that are part of a franchise or a buying group. VAST provides point-of-sale, inventory management, electronic purchasing and customer relationship management capabilities. It also allows the service provider to connect with parts and tires warehouse distributors and parts stores through either VAST&rsquo;s online services and products or other industry connectivity solutions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
	Autowork Online.
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	This is a UK-developed product that is sold both in North America and the&nbsp;UK Market.&nbsp;&nbsp;This product is designed for and targeted at small single location automotive installers. The Autowork Online product provides estimate, job card, parts procurement and invoice capabilities. It also allows the automotive installer to connect with parts distributors to purchase components. Autowork Online is delivered as a service over the Internet, commonly known as SaaS, allowing customers to purchase the solution on a monthly basis without the need to manage the system.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
	Vertical Marke
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	ts
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
	Trader.
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	This is a UK-developed product that is sold in the&nbsp;UK&nbsp;Market. This product is designed for and targeted at generic wholesalers and distributors. Based on the Autopart codebase, the product provides point of sale, inventory management, electronic purchasing capabilities and a fully integrated accounting module.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 9PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	Information Products
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	MAM&nbsp;provides product catalog and vehicle repair information required to enable point-of-sale transactions. These proprietary database
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	products and services generate recurring revenues through monthly or annual subscription fees.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	MAM Ltd. develops and maintains proprietary information products that differentiate its products from those of the majority of its competitors in
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	the&nbsp;UK Market. In North America, MAM NA also&nbsp;develops and maintains&nbsp;proprietary information products, and also maintains a proprietary&nbsp;workflow capability that integrates information products sourced from its suppliers for its automotive parts and tire customers, including warehouse distributors, parts stores and automotive service providers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	The principal information service for both MAM NA
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	and MAM Ltd. is Autocat+, an auto parts catalog that uses the DaaS distribution model. Autocat+ provides access to a database of automobile vehicle applications for&nbsp;the&nbsp;NA and&nbsp;UK markets &nbsp; that enables users to access information about parts quickly and accurately. The Autocat+ service is centrally hosted and data is accessed by users via MAM&#39;s business management software, a standalone desktop application, or web application. Data can also be &#39;consumed&#39; via a Web Service for integration into B2C websites. Information in Autocat+ is maintained through an automatic verification and standardization process, with updates published daily.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV ID="PGBK" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT;">
<DIV ID="PGNUM" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	3
</DIV>
<HR NOSHADE="NOSHADE" STYLE="BORDER: CURRENTCOLOR; BORDER-IMAGE: NONE; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; BACKGROUND-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0);">
<A NAME="eolPage8"></A>
<DIV ID="PGHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT;">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	In addition, information products developed or resold by MAM&nbsp;NA include
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Interchange Catalog, a database that provides cross references of original equipment manufacturer part numbers to aftermarket manufacturer part numbers; Price Updating, a service that provides electronic price updates following a price change by the part manufacturer; Labor Guide, a database used by automotive service providers to estimate labor hours for purposes of providing written estimates of repair costs to customers; Scheduled Service Intervals, a database of maintenance intervals; and Tire Sizing, a database that cross-references various tire products and applications.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 9PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	Online Services
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 9PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	MAM
<B>
</B>
	offers online e-commerce services in the form of business to business and business to consumer implementations in North America and the UK Market.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	These online services connect the automotive aftermarket from manufacturers through warehouse distributors and parts stores to automotive service providers for the purpose of purchasing parts and tires, fleet and national account transaction processing and online product price information.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
	OpenWebs&trade;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	e-Commerce Gateway Services
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	In the&nbsp;NA market, VAST
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&rsquo;s e-commerce gateway services&nbsp;use automotive industry standard messaging specifications to deliver online services that connect the automotive aftermarket supply chain for the purpose of purchasing parts and tires, fleet and national account transaction processing, online product and price updating for parts and tires.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
	OpenWebs&trade;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	e-Commerce Browser Services
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	In North America, VAST
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&rsquo;s e-commerce browser services enable warehouse distributors and parts stores to provide an online service to automotive service providers for the purpose of purchasing parts and tires, accessing account information and other browser-based channel management services.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
	Autonet
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	In the UK Market,
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Autonet online services connect manufacturers, warehouse distributors, parts stores and automotive service providers for the purpose of purchasing parts and tires, fleet and national account transaction processing and product information and price distribution.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 9PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	Customer Support and Consulting and Training
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	We&nbsp;provide support, consulting and training to its customers to ensure the successful use of its products and services. We believe this extra leve
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	l of commitment and service builds customer relationships, enhances customer satisfaction and maximizes customer retention. These services consist of the following:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX;">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY;">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0.8PT 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&bull;
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0.8PT 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
	Phone and online support.
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Customers can call dedicated support lines to speak with knowledgeable personnel who provide support and perform on-line problem solving as required.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX;">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY;">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&bull;
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0.8PT 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
	Implementation, education and training consulting.
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Our consulting and training teams work together to minimize the disruption to a customer&rsquo;s business during the implementation process of a new system, and to maximize the customer&rsquo;s benefit from the use of the system through training.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	We also provide a cu
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	stomer-only support portal that allows customers direct access to tutorials, on-line documentation and information related to products and services. New customers enter into support service agreements, and most retain such agreements for as long as they own the system. Monthly fees vary with the number of locations and the software modules, information products and online services subscribed to. The agreements are generally month-to-month agreements.&nbsp;We offer training at&nbsp;facilities in both the UK and US, as well as the customers&rsquo; facilities and online, for product updates or to introduce specific new capabilities.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	MAM&#39;s catalog information products are delivered by its Autocat+&nbsp;product teams in NA and UK. The Autocat+ product teams source, standardize and format data collected in an electronic format from over 300 automotive parts manufacturers in both regions and the data is provided to its customers via the Internet.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<DIV ID="PGBK" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT;">
<DIV ID="PGNUM" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	4
</DIV>
<HR NOSHADE="NOSHADE" STYLE="BORDER: CURRENTCOLOR; BORDER-IMAGE: NONE; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; BACKGROUND-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0);">
<A NAME="eolPage9"></A>
<DIV ID="PGHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY;">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	Distribution
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	There are two primary vertical distribution channels for aftermarket parts and tire distribution: the traditional wholesale channel and the retail channel.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
<B>
	Automotive Aftermarket Distribution
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Channels
</FONT>
</B>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX;">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY;">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&bull;&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0.8PT 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
	Traditional Wholesale Channel
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	. The wholesale channel is the predominant distribution channel in the automotive aftermarket. It is characterized by the distribution of parts from the manufacturer to a warehouse distributor, to parts stores and then to automotive service providers. Warehouse distributors sell to automotive service providers through parts stores, which are positioned geographically near the automotive service providers they serve. This distribution method provides for the rapid distribution of parts.&nbsp;We have&nbsp;products and services that meet the needs of the warehouse distributors, parts stores and the automotive service providers.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX;">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY;">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&bull;
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0.8PT 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
	Retail Channel
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	. The retail channel is comprised of large specialty retailers, small independent parts stores and regional chains that sell to &ldquo;do-it-yourself&rdquo; customers. Larger specialty retailers, such as Advance Auto Parts, AutoZone, Inc., and O&rsquo;Reilly Automotive, Inc. carry a greater number of parts and accessories at more attractive prices than smaller retail outlets and are gaining market share. The business management systems used in this channel are either custom developed by the large specialty retailers or purchased from business systems providers by small to medium-sized businesses.&nbsp;We have&nbsp;products and services that support the retail channel.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	In addition to these two primary channels, some aftermarket parts and tires&nbsp;are being distributed to new
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	car dealers. The business management systems used in this channel have unique functionality specific to new car dealerships.&nbsp;We sell a small number of products into the auto service provider side of car dealerships. Also, aftermarket wholesalers of parts and tires provide online purchasing capabilities to some new car dealerships.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	Product Development
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Our product development strategy,&nbsp;designed to add value to&nbsp;our customers&#39; businesses through products and services designed to&nbsp;optimize efficiency,&nbsp;consists of the following three key components:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX;">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY;">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&bull;
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0.8PT 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Integrating all of our
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	products so that our various software solutions work together seamlessly, thereby eliminating the need to switch between applications;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX;">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY;">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&bull;
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0.8PT 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Enhancing&nbsp;our
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	current products and services to support our customers&rsquo;&nbsp;changing&nbsp;needs; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -18PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX;">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY;">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&bull;
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0.8PT 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Providing a migration path to our
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	business management systems, reducing a fear that many customers have that changing systems will disrupt business.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	Sales and Marketing
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	MAM&#39;s
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;sales and marketing strategy is to acquire customers and retain them by cross-selling and up-selling a range of commercially compelling business management systems, information products and online services.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Within the parts, tire and auto service provider segments, each division sells and markets through a combination of field sales, inside
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	sales, and independent representatives.&nbsp;We seek to partner with large customers or buying groups and leverage their relationships with their customers or members. Incentive pay is a significant portion of the total compensation package for all sales representatives and sales managers. Outside sales representatives focus primarily on identifying and selling to new customers complemented by an inside sales focus on selling upgrades and new software applications to its installed customer base.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Our
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;marketing approach aims to maximize customer retention, and secure recurring revenues, by leveraging&nbsp;our reputation for satisfying customers and for delivering systems, information and services that improve a customer&rsquo;s commercial results.&nbsp;We likewise continually aim&nbsp;to enhance the productivity of the field sales team, and to create the cross-selling and up-selling opportunities for our systems, information products and online services.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV ID="PGBK" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT;">
<DIV ID="PGNUM" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	5
</DIV>
<HR NOSHADE="NOSHADE" STYLE="BORDER: CURRENTCOLOR; BORDER-IMAGE: NONE; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; BACKGROUND-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0);">
<A NAME="eolPage10"></A>
<DIV ID="PGHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT;">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	Research and Development
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	MAM spent
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	$3.8 million for the year ended June 30, 2016 on research and development, as compared to&nbsp;$3.9 million for the year ended June 30, 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	Patent and Trademark
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	We rely on a combination of intellectual property laws, as well as confidentiality procedures and contractual provisions, to protect our proprietary technology and our bra
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	nd. We have not sought patent protection for any of our products. We have registered our business name, &ldquo;MAM Software,&rdquo; with the&nbsp;US Patent and Trademark office. In addition, we have registered our tagline, &ldquo;Driving Business Performance,&rdquo; with the&nbsp;US Patent and Trademark office.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	Customers
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	During the years ended June 30, 2016 and 2015, no customer accounted for more than 10% of&nbsp;our
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	total net revenues.&nbsp;&nbsp;Our top ten customers collectively accounted for 15% and 16% of our total net&nbsp;revenues during&nbsp;the years ended June 30, 2016 and 2015, respectively.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	Competition
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	In MAM NA, Autopart&nbsp;competes primarily with Epicor Inc. (formerly Activant, Inc.), WHI and several smaller software companies, includin
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	g Autologue, DST and Fuse 5. VAST competes primarily with Maddenco, ASA, Tasco and RO Writer, each of which provides similar products and services as VAST,&nbsp;to the&nbsp;US automotive aftermarket. We are subject to the ongoing threat of in-house developed custom systems, information products and online services.&nbsp; For example, AutoZone, Inc. and Genuine Parts Company&rsquo;s NAPA Parts Group, each have developed their own business management systems and electronic automotive parts catalogs for their stores and members, although we currently have a partnership agreement with each of these companies to supply their information products through&nbsp;our solutions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	In North America,&nbsp;we expect to compete successfully against our co
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	mpetitors using two separate and complimentary strategies. First,&nbsp;we will continue to focus on promoting&nbsp;and selling our complete supply chain solutions that provide businesses with easy integration of&nbsp;our business management information systems into their existing supply chain structures. Second,&nbsp;we will continue our strategy of working with those businesses that already manage their own supply chains and information products (catalogs), such as AutoZone, helping to improve and compliment their systems with&nbsp;our products.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	In&nbsp;North America, VAST competes with multiple products across different market segments, so its competitors vary by segment.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Within the warehouse distribution segment, we
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	will continue to promote our Autopart product which enables large warehouses with hundreds of thousands of parts to locate, manage, pack and deliver the parts with ease and efficiency.&nbsp;Our prospective customers are moving towards modern solutions which integrate seamlessly with third-party e-commerce solutions.&nbsp;We have&nbsp;been selling Autopart successfully in the&nbsp;UK Market since 2000, which we believe will help to establish this product in North America.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	The tire segm
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	ent is comprised of three distinct elements: retail, wholesale and commercial. Within the tire segment and the auto service segment,&nbsp;we focus on clients and market requirements, which we believe will enable&nbsp;us to offer&nbsp;our clients the best solution, regardless of the size of a client&rsquo;s business. By continually integrating and extending the functionality of our solutions across the entire supply chain,&nbsp;we believe that&nbsp;we will be able to offer existing and potential clients products that suit their present and future needs. Our management believes that our products will present existing and potential clients the opportunity to move away from their older existing systems, which may restrict their market opportunities, and will permit integration into additional sales channels and reduce the costly maintenance of older systems.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<DIV ID="PGBK" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT;">
<DIV ID="PGNUM" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	6
</DIV>
<HR NOSHADE="NOSHADE" STYLE="BORDER: CURRENTCOLOR; BORDER-IMAGE: NONE; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; BACKGROUND-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0);">
<A NAME="eolPage11"></A>
<DIV ID="PGHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT;">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	The auto parts segment within the auto service space has many competitors who have developed applications for single location auto service shops.
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Many of these have been developed by parts distributors like NAPA and Advance Auto Parts. While these applications do well in a small single location store, they are not widely distributed in the multi-store location segment of the auto parts business. We believe that our Autowork Online product is highly suited to single store locations. The strategy for generating revenue in this sector of the market will be to establish reseller agreements with distributor partners. In addition, we will focus on multi-store locations for which our product VAST is highly suited.&nbsp;We believe that this multi-store ability offers strong opportunities to beat the competition in this area and increase our customer base.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	The last area that
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	we plan to compete in is the e-commerce space, providing new&nbsp;tools and&nbsp;solutions for this expanding Internet marketplace.&nbsp;&nbsp;Our goal for&nbsp;the OpenWebs&trade; product is to connect both parts and tire partners together in a real-time environment so they can perform electronic ordering, gauge inventory levels as well as disseminate information. Within the tire segment,&nbsp;we feel that&nbsp;we have&nbsp;a competitive advantage.&nbsp;Our marketplace knowledge has led us to believe that most tire distributors either do not have a business-to-business solution or have developed solutions from independent sources. While the parts segment of this market is largely tied to Epicor, Inc. (formerly Activant, Inc.) at this time, we believe that customers are looking for solutions that simply integrate their supply chain, completely and without further restrictions.&nbsp;Our OpenWebs&trade; solution will allow our customers to achieve these goals.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	In the UK Market, we&nbsp;compete primarily with Epico
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	r, Inc., (formerly Activant, Inc.) in the parts sector of automotive aftermarket. In the tire sector of the UK Market, we compete primarily with CAM Systems, Tyreman and Team Systems. In the vertical sector of&nbsp;the UK Market, we compete with Kerridge, Chatsworth, EDP, Blue Rock, OGL and Ramtac. We feel that we provide a range of solutions that combine proven concepts with cutting-edge technology that are functional, effective and reliable, and offer solutions that enable business to identify and implement new efficiencies and increase existing efficiencies, to our competitive advantage.&nbsp;These efforts, together with strong post-sales support and ongoing in depth product and market support, will assist&nbsp;us in generating and maintaining its position within the market.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Several large enterprise resource planning and software companies, including Microsoft Corporation,
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Oracle Corporation and SAP AG, continue to supply Enterprise Resource Planning (&ldquo;ERP&rdquo;) and Supply Chain Management (&ldquo;SCM&rdquo;) products to medium sized original equipment manufacturers and suppliers within the automotive market, but to date have not focused strongly on the aftermarket. These companies appear focused on the efficient management of the supply chain and to date do not appear to be looking to supply systems and solutions into the jobber and service segments of the aftermarket. However, there can be no assurance that those companies will not develop or acquire a competitive product or service in the future.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	Company Information
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	MAM was formed in December of 2005 following a spin-off from another publicly traded company
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Our principal executive office is located at Maple P
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	ark, Maple Court, Tankersley, Barnsley,&nbsp;UK S75 3DP and our phone number is 011-44-122-635-2900. Our website address is
<I>
	www.mamsoftware.com
</I>
	. Information contained in our website does not form part of&nbsp;this report and is intended for informational purposes only.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	Employees
</B>

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	As of June 30, 2016,&nbsp;we had&nbsp;230 full-time employees and 8 part-time employees.
</P>

<EFX_RISK_FACTORS>

</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0.8PT 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

	Risk Factors
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
	Our business, financial condition and results of operations are subject to a number of risk factors, both those that are known to us and identified below and others that may arise from time to time. These
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	risk factors could cause our actual results to differ materially from those suggested by forward-looking statements in this Report and elsewhere, and may adversely affect our business, financial condition or results of operations. If any of these risk factors should occur, moreover, the trading price of our securities could decline, and investors in our securities could lose all or part of their investment in our securities. These risk factors should be carefully considered in evaluating our business.
</FONT>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	Ri
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	sks Related to MAM and Our Business
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
<B>
	We may fail to address risks we face as a growing business,
</B>
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
<B>
	which could adversely affect the implementation of our business plan.
</B>
</I>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	We are prone to all of the risks inherent in growing a
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	business. &nbsp;You should consider the likelihood of our future success to be highly speculative in light of the limited resources, problems, expenses, risks and complications frequently encountered by entities at our current stage of development.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	To
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	address these risks, we must, among other things:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX;">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

</TD>

<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&bull;
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0.8PT 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	implement and successfully execute our business and marketing strategy;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 72PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX;">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&bull;
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0.8PT 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	continue to develop new products and upgrade our existing products;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX;">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&bull;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	respond to industry and competitive
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	developments;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 72PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX;">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&bull;
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0.8PT 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	attract, retain, and motivate qualified personnel; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0PT 0PT 72PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: -36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-INDENT: 0PX;">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP;">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&bull;
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT 0.8PT 0PT 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	obtain equity and debt financing on satisfactory terms and in timely fashion in amounts adequate to implement our business plan and meet our obligations.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	We may not be
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	successful in addressing these risks and if we do not, our business prospects, financial condition and results of operations would be materially adversely affected.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
<B>
	Global market disruptions may adversely affect our business and results of oper
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	ations.
</FONT>
</B>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Recent disruptions in the current global credit and financial markets have included diminished liquidity and credit availability, a decline in economic growth and uncertainty about economic stability. There can be no assurance that there will not
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	be further deterioration in credit and financial markets and confidence in economic conditions. These economic uncertainties affect businesses such as ours in a number of ways, making it difficult to accurately forecast and plan our future business activities. We believe that the recent global economic slowdown and the resulting slow recovery have caused certain customers to reduce or delay capital spending plans, which, if prolonged, could impact our growth expectations as potential and existing customers continue to delay decisions to purchase or upgrade their systems. We are unable to predict the likely duration and severity of the current disruptions in the credit and financial markets and adverse global economic conditions and its potential impact on our business. If the current uncertain economic conditions continue or further deteriorate, our business and results of operations could be materially and adversely affected.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV ID="PGBK" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0PT; MARGIN-LEFT: 0PT;">
<DIV ID="PGNUM" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	8
</DIV>
<HR NOSHADE="NOSHADE" STYLE="BORDER: CURRENTCOLOR; BORDER-IMAGE: NONE; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0); PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS; BACKGROUND-COLOR: RGB(0, 0, 0);">
<A NAME="eolPage13"></A>
<DIV ID="PGHDR" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT;">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
<B>
	Political and economic uncertainty arising from&nbsp;a majority of voters approving a&nbsp;referendum&nbsp;for the United Kingdom to exit the European Union could adversely impact our financial results.
</B>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
<B>
	&nbsp;
</B>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	In
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	June 2016, a majority of voters in the UK elected to withdraw from the European Union (E.U.) in a national referendum (also referred to as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&ldquo;Brexit&rdquo;). Negotiations are expected to commence to determine the future terms of the UK&rsquo;s relationship with the E.U.&nbsp;MAM UK represents&nbsp;a significant portion of our revenues and profitability. The announcement of Brexit caused significant volatility in global stock markets and currency exchange rate fluctuations that resulted in the strengthening of the&nbsp;US dollar against the British pound. During periods of a strengthening dollar, our reported international revenues are&nbsp;reduced because the British pound translates into fewer US dollars. The long term effects of Brexit will depend on any agreements the&nbsp;UK makes to retain access to European markets either during a transitional period or more permanently. Any of the potential effects of Brexit could have unpredictable consequences for credit markets and adversely affect our business, results of operations, and financial performance.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
<B>
	Financial difficulties or the bankruptcy of one or more of our
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	major customers could adversely affect our results.
</FONT>
</B>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Our ability to collect our accounts receivable and future sales depends, in part, on the financial strength of our customers. We grant credit, generally without collateral, to our customers. Consequent
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	ly, we are subject to credit risk related to changes in business and economic factors throughout the UK Market&nbsp;and North America. In the event customers experience financial difficulty, and particularly if bankruptcy results, our profitability may be adversely impacted by our failure to collect our accounts receivable in excess of our estimated allowance for uncollectible accounts. Additionally, our future revenues could be reduced by the loss of a customer due to bankruptcy. Our failure to collect accounts receivable and/or the loss of one or more major customers could have an adverse effect on our net income and financial condition.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
<B>
	We may fail to successfully develop, market and sell our products
</B>
</I>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<B>
	.
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	To achieve profitable operations, w
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	e, along with our subsidiaries, must continue successfully to improve, market and sell existing products and develop, market and sell new products. Our product development efforts may not be successful. The development of new software products is highly uncertain and subject to a number of significant risks. The development cycle-from inception to installing the software for customers - can be lengthy and uncertain. The ability to market the product is unpredictable and may cause delays. Potential products may appear promising at early stages of development, and yet may not reach the market for a number of reasons.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
<B>
	We may encounter significant financial and operating risks if we grow our business through acquisitions.
</B>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	As part of our growth strategy, we
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	may seek to acquire or invest in complementary or competitive businesses, products or technologies. The process of integrating acquired assets into our operations may result in unforeseen operating difficulties and expenditures and may absorb significant management attention that would otherwise be available for the ongoing development of our business. We may allocate a significant portion of our available working capital to finance all or a portion of the purchase price relating to possible acquisitions. Any future acquisition or investment opportunity may require us to obtain additional financing to complete the transaction. The anticipated benefits of any acquisitions may not be realized. In addition, future acquisitions by us could result in potentially dilutive issuances of equity securities, the incurrence of debt and contingent liabilities and amortization expenses related to intangible assets, any of which could materially adversely affect our operating results and financial position. Acquisitions also involve other risks, including entering markets in which we have no or limited prior experience.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<I>
<B>
	An increase in competition from other software manufacturers could have a material adverse effect on our ability to generate revenue and cash flow.
</B>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	Competition in our industry is intense. Potential competitors in the UK Market and North America are numerous. Most competitors have substantially greater capital resources, marketing experience, research and development staffs and facilities than we have. Our compet
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	itors may be able to develop products before us or develop more effective products or market them more effectively which would limit our ability to generate revenue and cash flow.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN: 0PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; FONT-FAMILY: TIMES NEW ROMAN, TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
	&nbsp;
